email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something in the mid-40s. Can you check if there’s any flexibility? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer a revised rate of $48.50 per ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. We can agree to $48.50 per ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Please confirm the demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Once confirmed, we can proceed with the fixture. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed. The laycan is firm at 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the fixture recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Looking forward to the fixture recap. Thanks for your help on this. Best, John
